0.title: Date A Live Community Bot
0.content: Discord Bot used by the DAL Community Server, with working levelling, economy and moderation systems in place. The levelling and economy system utilize the usage of MongoDB to store details.

1.title: Makima Bot
1.content: Discord Bot used by the Chainsaw Man Community Server, with different APIs implemented to utilize the theme of the server with bot permissions enabled and slash commands.

2.title: Portfolio V1
2.content: First version of my portfolio created using NextJS and Tailwind CSS as well as Formspree just for the contact form.

3.title: Apollo
3.content: A concept for a mental health smart watch app that allows users to track their state of being and provide them with a way to track their progress. As well as having coping mechanisms to help people.

4.title: Idle Farm
4.content: Idle Farm is an idle game created for a school project using the Unity Engine and C#. The game is a farming simulator where you can plant crops, raise animals and sell them for money.

5.title: Little Tokyo
5.content: A restaurant website created using ASP.NET Core, C# and SQL. It allows users to check out the menu, order and pay

6.title: Gatsby Test
6.content: This is a test on which JS framework I want to start using and working with to create websites.

7.title: Power
7.content: Power is another Discord Bot that is just a starter bot for people who want to learn how to code Discord Bots. It has a few commands that are useful for beginners and a few commands that are just for fun.

8.title: GCDatabase
8.content: GCDatabase is a project I am currently working on which is a database for the game 7 Deadly Sins Grand Cross. It is a work in progress and is currently being developed using NextJS and Tailwind CSS.
